talk.author: did:plc:e3kfoylwdy65x4arjhrego7d
talk.utter: If anything, he is worse off in Japan considering the laws there and how harsh some of the prisons there can be. He embezzeled some of the SD investors money if I recall correctly. He does that in JP, he is a toast. And I am pretty sure he will.

talk.author: did:plc:2cprohtrkm6cslezdij3litc
talk.utter: He's Brit/Bangladeshi citizen, if JP has extradition, he's safe and sound. Also last time i checked JP was embracing a-i scam in full with little to no regulation, did i miss something? He wouldn't have gone there if he risked fr to get jailed.
